battle.dmg_in_reviewer: Enable damage display in the reviewer.
battle.cards_per_round: Number of cards to review per round.
controls.key_for_opening_closing_ankimon: Key to open or close the Ankimon interface.
gui.styling_in_reviewer: Apply custom styles in the reviewer.
gui.pop_up_dialog_message_on_defeat: Display a pop-up message upon defeat.
gui.review_hp_bar_thickness: Thickness of the HP bar in reviews.
gui.reviewer_image_gif: Show GIF images in the reviewer.
gui.reviewer_text_message_box: Display a message box in the reviewer.
gui.reviewer_text_message_box_time: Duration of the message box display.
gui.show_mainpkmn_in_reviewer: Show the main Pokémon during reviews.
gui.view_main_front: Display the front view of the main Pokémon.
gui.xp_bar_location: Location of the XP bar on the screen.
misc.language: Select the language for the interface.
